title: Competitive Analysis
description: Build a competitive landscape overview to help clients understand their market position.

body.content: Help me build a competitive analysis for my SBDC client.

body.label: Top Competitors
body.placeholder: e.g. Main Street Bakery — established, strong foot traffic
body.tip: List competitors and what you know about them

body.label: What Makes Them Different
body.placeholder: What does this business do better or differently than competitors? e.g. 'Only gluten-free bakery in the area, strong Instagram following, 20 years baking experience'

body.content:
As an SBDC advisor, I need a competitive analysis framework I can walk through with my client. Please provide:

1. Competitive Landscape Overview — summarize the market and where the client fits
2. Competitor Comparison Matrix — a table comparing the client vs. competitors on key factors (price, quality, location, online presence, unique offerings)
3. Client's Competitive Advantages — what they should lean into based on their differentiators
4. Vulnerability Assessment — where competitors have an edge and what to watch for
5. Positioning Recommendations — 3-5 specific strategies to strengthen their market position
6. Discussion Questions — 5 questions to dig deeper with the client about their competitive situation

Keep it practical and actionable. Use plain language suitable for a small business owner.
